item.title: Tekken 8 DLC character Fahkumram and next three updates announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/tekken-8-dlc-character-fahkumram-and-next-three-updates-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Fahkumram due out this summer.

Bandai Namco has announced Tekken 8 downloadable content character Fahkumram. He will launch this summer. Additionally, the version 2.01 update will launch on May 13, followed by version 2.02 on June 3, and version 2.03 this summer.

Here is an overview of each update:

  • Version 2.01 (May 13)
    • Tekken Ghost Showdown (free, Tekken Fight Lounge)
    • Cyber Phantom Pack (paid, Tekken Shop)
    • Vigilante Tech Pack (paid, Tekken Shop)
    • Balance adjustments
  • Version 2.02 (June 3)
    • Karate Kid: Legends collaboration
      • Hoodie (free, Tekken Shop)
      • Vision takeover
    • New classic costumes
      • Kuma Costume 01 (Tiger) (paid, Tekken Shop)
      • Panda Costume 01 (Calico) (paid, Tekken Shop)
      • Dragunov Costume 01 (paid, Tekken Shop)
      • Kuma / Panda Color Costumes (free, Tekken Shop)
    • Balance adjustments
  • Version 2.03 (Summer)
    • PAC-MAN collaboration
      • Battle Stage: Pac-Pixels (paid, part of the Season 2 Character & Stage Pass)
      • Hit Effects (Pac-Man) (free, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
      • T-Shirt (PAC-MAN 45th Anniversary) (free, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
      • Plushie Ghost (PAC-MAN) Pack (free, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
      • PAC-MAN Ball (free, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
      • PAC-MAN Head (paid, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
      • Ready (PAC-MAN) (paid, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
      • Play (PAC-MAN) (paid, part of Fight Pass Round 6)
    • Fight Pass Round 6
    • Balance adjustments

Tekken 8 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Season 2 Spring and Summer Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Guilty Gear: Strive DLC character Unika launches May 27
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/guilty-gear-strive-dlc-character-unika-launches-may-27

Guilty Gear: Strive downloadable content character Unika will launch on May 27 for $6.99 / 880 yen, Arc System Works announced.

Guilty Gear: Strive is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers Anime / DLC Character Unika Teaser Trailer

#GGST 新キャラクター「ユニカ」をアニメの映像と共にチラ見せ！
アニメ #GGSTDR も引き続きお楽しみ下さい！
New character "Unika" have some sneek peek with animes!
Please enjoy rest of our anime #GGSTDR too!#ギルティギア pic.twitter.com/mXIBHQICXR

— GUILTY GEAR OFFICIAL (@GUILTYGEAR_PR) May 10, 2025

(MP4 file here.)

item.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising DLC character Galleon launches May 28
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/granblue-fantasy-versus-rising-dlc-character-galleon-launches-may-28

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Galleon the Gold of the Six Dragons.

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising Character Pass Season 2 downloadable content character Galleon will launch on May 28 for $7.99 / 880 yen, publisher Cygames and developer Arc System Works announced.

Here is Galleon’s description, via Cygames:

Galleon (voiced by Justine Lee in English, Suzuko Mimori in Japanese)

Galleon thrives at close to midrange combat, using a captivating selection of command throws to keep her foes on edge. By summoning Meteorites to restrict movement and launching foes into the air with Seism, she can force foes to go on the defensive-before throwing them back into the ground!

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Galleon Gameplay Trailer

Japanese
